海岸を追いかける！ 海岸で慰めを得る人のために、私はすべての幸運が来ることを知っています！ 今日あなたのウミガメを見つけてください！

Please make sure your personal computing configuration meets all requirements for running this software, including confirming a correct configuration of a compatible virtual reality head mounted visual display device, 6 degrees of freedom hand tracking technology per arm, and a healthy sense of ａｅｓｔｈｅｔｉｃ

Tested with HTC Vive, supports front-facing VR systems
